2.text: Place the remaining cards in the center.

3.text: Turn over a draw pile card to form the discard pile.

4.text: Match rank or suit to play cards.

5.text: Draw cards when you have no playable cards in your hand.

6.text: Play cards one at a time until a player has none left.

7.text: Count points to decide the winner if the draw pile runs out.

8.text: Calculate the score for the hand and continue playing.

9.text: Shuffle the cards and play until a player matches or beats the point goal.

10.text: Increase the number of cards in the starting hand.

11.text: Assign crazy actions to certain cards.

12.text: Have players indicate when they’re on their last card.

13.text: Determine an offensive draw card or cards.

14.text: Designate a blocker card to combat draw cards.

15.text: Recognize the different aspects of this version of Crazy Eights.

18.text: Point out the importance of aces for defense.
